title: MD
biography: This is a list of South Korean male television, film, musical, theatre, and voice actors who are active in South Korea. Names are listed as stage name.
aiSummary: Hyeong Gon Moon is a surgical oncology specialist with an H-index of 43 at Samsung Medical Center (Member). Has been published in Cell Discovery, Cell Death and Differentiation, Molecular & Cellular Proteomics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
